pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Sebastián Piñera, President of Chile | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with President Sebastián Piñera of Chile. 

The leaders noted the excellent and wide-ranging bilateral relationship between Canada and Chile, and focused their discussion on their shared agendas in support of LGBTQ2 rights, including through the Equal Rights Coalition, and gender equality and women’s empowerment. 

Prime Minister Trudeau and President Piñera discussed the importance of promoting gender equality. Prime Minister Trudeau also took the opportunity to highlight Canada’s strong commitment to this issue, including through its 2018 G7 Presidency.
